refentry:
session_shared 3mp Metaproxy Module
session_shared Module for sharing result-sets etc. between threads
DESCRIPTION
This module is experimental and NOT SUPPORTED. When complete, it will enable Metaproxy to share resources such as result-sets between multiple threads, yielding performance improvements.
EXAMPLES
A typical configuration looks like this:
<filter type="session_shared"> ### Not yet defined </filter>
SEE ALSO
metaproxy 1
©right;
